sentences.sContent: A single ampersand is displayed in the caption and no characters are underlined.
sentences.sContent_eng: A single ampersand is displayed in the caption and no characters are underlined.
sentences.sCn: 这样，在标题中显示单个“&”符，并且没有带下划线的字符。

sentences.sContent: Our test is almost identical, but instead of the OK button and our OK button caption change, we'll check for the Cancel action.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our test is almost identical, but instead of the OK button and our OK button caption change, we'll check for the Cancel action.
sentences.sCn: 我们的测试几乎是相同的，但并没有确定按钮，我们确定按钮的标题的变化，我们将检查的取消行动。

synos.tran: [语][计][图情]标题；字幕；说明；逮捕

remMethod.val: capt(拿， 抓) + ion → 抓住主要内容 → 标题
